name: Michael J. DONNELLY, Petitioner v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW (ESAB Group, Inc.), Respondent
name_abbreviation: Donnelly v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

parties: Michael J. DONNELLY, Petitioner v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW (ESAB Group, Inc.), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of April 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Commonwealth Court’s decision is VACATED and the matter is REMANDED for reconsideration in light of Diehl v. UCBR (ESAB Group, Inc.), 618 Pa. 592, 57 A.3d 1209 (2012).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
65 A.3d 298
Michael J. DONNELLY, Petitioner v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW (ESAB Group, Inc.), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 19, 2013.
